Package it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet

The root package of the BabelNet API.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BabelCategory The category of a BabelSynset
BabelGloss A gloss in BabelNet.
BabelImage An image in BabelNet.
BabelNet A class to programmatically access BabelNet.
BabelNetConfiguration The PropertiesConfiguration hub for the BabelNet API.
BabelNetDemo A demo class to test BabelNet's various features.
BabelNetGraphEdge Class to model an edge in the BabelNet graph.
BabelPointer Default, hard-coded, implementation of IPointer for BabelNet.
BabelSense A sense in BabelNet.
BabelSenseComparator Comparator for BabelSenses that (a) puts WordNet senses first; (b) sorts WordNet senses based on their sense number; (c) sorts Wikipedia senses lexicographically.
BabelSenseTranslationInfo A class modeling translation-related information pertaining to a BabelSense
BabelSynset A synset in BabelNet.
BabelSynsetComparator Comparator for BabelSynsets that (a) puts WordNet synsets first; (b) sorts WordNet synsets based on the sense number of a specific input word (see the constructor); (c) sorts Wikipedia synsets lexicographically based on their main sense
 

Enum Summary
BabelNetIndexField Field used to index BabelSynsets and BabelSenses in the Lucene index.
BabelSenseSource Enumeration of the different sources for the BabelNet senses.
BabelSynsetSource A type of Babel synset, flagging in which region of the KB the synset lies.
BabelSynsetType A kind of BabelSynset -- namely, entity or class.
 

Package it.uniroma1.lcl.babelnet Description

The root package of the BabelNet API. For more information start by looking at the main access point to BabelNet, defined in the BabelNet class.
